But things like issuance are surely interesting to many

author: potuz

author: sky.cactus
content: I don't think the spam bots in this Discord server are anywhere near bad enough to need a tightly controlled limited-access communication channels.

author: sky.cactus
content: Unless you are not talking about spam bots but rather you want to limit the set of people who participate in the conversation to some subset of the population, in which case I don't agree with that strategy.
